text:
5/30/2021 0:27 91 Garbage Cleaning This is to inform you about the deplorable and unhygienic condition of the main road, Narayan Pillai Street.. opposite to St. Francis Xavier Church, Bharthi Nagar, Bangalore - 560001.
A lot of garbage is thrown on the main road, due to which lot of mosquitoes and flies are breeding...added to it are thousands of rats, who have made a colony of their own...
The stinking smell  which becomes even more worst in rain, is another pain for all those residing around the garbage heap... effecting the children and elderly people..
Request you to kindly look into this and take necessary action at the earliest...
Hoping for immediate action from your end...

7/28/2019 8:29 184 Irregular garbage collection and garbage thrown everywhere in the locality Irregular garbage collection and garbage thrown everywhere in the locality

Hi,

I live in RRnagar, uttarahalli , Bangalore.In the locality garbage has become a humongous issue. Garbage is not collected in regular intervals [In some dead end roads, garbage has not been collected ever]. Because of which people tend to throw garbage in any empty spot next to rods, houses and shops. Which, not just looks bad but also make the residents prone to many contagious diseases. 
I request the concerned department to look into the issue and provide a solution as early as possible.

Regards,
A Resident of RRnagar 155 10.0 Dr.vishnuvardhan Rd, Bharath Housing Society Layout, Subramanyapura, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560061, India Krishna residency near mantri alpyne apartments 12.9041807 77.5260956 Uttarahalli 6.0 Garbage and Unsanitary Practices Clearance Of Garbage Dump Or Black Spot BBMP Resolved 2

text:
7/22/2019 20:12 117 Open uncovered Big Drain in Vinay aka Nagar shanthinagar constiency Bangalore Dear Sir,  
Vinay aka Nagar therer is a big Open drain,  with lot of mosquito,  foul smell,  24hrs,  and causing many diseases to the residents beside 1st main,  we are waiting from last 3decades to cover the same,  once it came in news paper as BBMP Alloted sufficient fund to cover the Drain,  but it also not happen,  
Hence we are happy to have a really good MLA 2nd time,  and same party corporate 2nd time.  Now we are sorry to say you are not yet covered,  it effecting old people,  small kids and women,  who are spending full day and night here. Moreover we have only small bridge of around 6feet,  but it's always filled with the garbage,  since there is no big boxes or the cleaning people do there jo only some VIP visits here.  
I attach this photograph for your person. 
Hence I request BBMP,  local Corporator, Ms. Suma Shivkumar   and our 2nd Time MLA NA Haris sir,  Mayor Sir,  And Deputy Mayor,  to look into this and do the need full Immediately,  for which Act of Kindness,  I shall ever remain grateful to you. 

Thanks & Regards
Mustaq Ahmed Shaik and residents of 4th cross,  1st Main,  Vinay aka Nagar Constituency. 
Bangalore 560030 155 10.0 93, 1St Main Rd, Jk Pura, Jalakanteshwara Nagar, Shanti Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560027, India Big drain in Vinayakanager 12.9500276 77.6011616 Shanthi Nagar 6.0 Garbage and Unsanitary Practices Clearance Of Garbage Dump Or Black Spot BBMP On-the-Job 1

2-1-2019 10:56 18 Irregular collection of Wet and Dry waste/Irregular hawkers shown and sweepers irregular. Hello Team,

I an a resident of this particular locality-No 43,2nd main venkatachari Nagar Rmv second stage extension.The hawkers are not regular ,they show up twice in a week and in particular expect bribe to be paid they are very indisciplined and never regular.

The streets are not cleaned for weeks together there are no sweepers who turn up regular.

If the issue of hawkers and no pick up of Garbage is not solved we need to escalate it to the commissioner-Bbmp.

Take this up as a top most priority. 155 10.0 2Nd Main Rd, Venkatachary Nagar, R.m.v. 2Nd Stage, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560094, India 2nd main venkatachari Nagar Rmv second stage extension 13.0422047 77.5629869 Radhakrishna Temple 6.0 Garbage and Unsanitary Practices Clearance Of Garbage Dump Or Black Spot BBMP Resolved 2

7/13/2020 8:43 146 The Garbage collecting employees are shouting at everyone The garbage collecting people are so senseless and useless. They are unfit to be employed. Doesn't even know how to talk to people. Using all bad words at people and not collecting the garbage even when wet waste and dry waste is given separate. If BBMP is nto ready to collect any plastic bags why is it being sold in the city? what should we do with the plastic bags? every thing on the earth is packed in plastic bags and what do you expect us to do with it?. We try our best to split and give it. However, these senseless retards are not ready to accept and collect the waste. Rather using all rubbish words at people. Why do BBMP employee such kind of nonsensical people. If they can not tolerate the people they should not come for public service duties.

text: 8/18/2020 19:23 172 Encroachment during Corona due to high electricity consumption There is an electric pole right in front of my home which is causing a lot of chaos. Due to this crisis situation the electricity consumption has increased drastically and due to that there are electricity related issues in the neighborhood ( we are also being affected by this). I also believe that this pole has crossed the threshold number of connections to household and it is also supplying power to a factory. Some affected people are coming for a physical fight without following social distancing and precautionary measures as they are in an assumption that since our house is closest to the pole we are involved in manipulating it and causing the trouble.We are being abused physically and mentally, today 18th August they tried to encroach into our building . KEB had confirmed in their presence that issue is caused due to high consumption and they have to fix it but they have not acted upon it. I humbly appeal to help our family in this crisis situation to resolve this dispute. 33 1.0 52, 1St Cross Rd, Tavarekere, Cashier Layout, 1St Stage, Btm Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560029, India 52, 1St Cross Rd, Tavarekere, Cashier Layout, 1St Stage, Btm Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560029, India 12.9219269 77.6115323 Madivala 4.0 Electricity and Power Supply Regular Supply Of Electricity BESCOM Open 0

I humbly appeal to help our family in this crisis situation to resolve this dispute. 33 1.0 52, 1St Cross Rd, Tavarekere, Cashier Layout, 1St Stage, Btm Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560029, India 52, 1St Cross Rd, Tavarekere, Cashier Layout, 1St Stage, Btm Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560029, India 12.9219269 77.6115323 Madivala 4.0 Electricity and Power Supply Regular Supply Of Electricity BESCOM Open 0

2/20/2019 7:34 163 HORRIBLE Water Supply Problem - BSK 3rd Stage, Kathreguppe, Poornaprajna Layout There is absolutely NO water supply in - BSK 3rd Stage, KATHREGUPPE, Poornaprajna Layout, in the LAST 3 DAYS !!!

Today (20th Feb) - the supply was supposed to start from 5:30 a.m. But, water started started trickling down at 6:30 a.m (1 hour delay) and after 30 mins, the supply almost stopped at 7 a.m.

Ever since the new linesman has come since past 1.5 months, the situation has become GRAVE !! Normally, the water supply was supposed to be there yesterday at 12 noon, but there was NO SUPPLY yesterday as well.

It's a general opinion that the major problem lies with the linesman. Mr. Sridhar the incharge engineer was contacted several times. Yesterday, I made more than 10 calls which he did not answer. 

We are totally out of water supply. In this layout which is BDA approved, we are all Law Abiding citizens and we pay our dues legally and regularly.

PLEASE ACKNOWLEDGE, HAVE SOME EMPATHY and SOLVE THE PROBLEM IMMEDIATELY. 182 2.0 125, 5Th Main Rd, Poorna Pragna Layout, Kempegowda Layout, Banashankari 3Rd Stage, Banashankari, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560085, India Kathreguppe Watertank 12.9321816 77.5504752 Katriguppe 23.0 Water Supply and Services Regular Water Supply BWSSB Open 0

9/20/2019 19:23 84 Water Pipe Leakage Sir/Madam, I, on behalf of all the public of 1st cross, I am writing this letter to you to complain about the past and present issue of water leakage from the underground pipeline of 1st cross Dead-End Road. 

Sir/Madam, it has been two years now, the water is seeping through the road and it causes slippery road. Due to this lot of public have sustained injures. The Water disposal system of this society has now become old and out-dated. Now, it is the time to find a permanent solution to this problem. I personally fell down twice due this water leakage on the road. 

I had even contacted the area water seeking help to repair this damaged pipeline. But unfortunately, he is least bothered about the issues. He himself dont have time to collect bribe from the public and always consumed with alcohol. 

This is a serious issue and it cannot linger anymore. The planning and maintenance department must seek a long-lasting solution. It is requested to you to repair the underground pipelines and install new manholes where necessary. 

Kindly take immediate note of our complaint. 

Thank you, 
Jaikiran 88 2.0 Gandhipuram, Whitefield, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560066, India 1st Main Road, Dead End Whitefield Bangalore 12.9713697 77.755937 Hagadur 23.0 Water Supply and Services Stop Water Leakage BWSSB Open 0

8/28/2019 10:58 67 Unauthorized tree construction and encroachment of Storm Water drain A few people are trying to take possession of this empty plot of land, this plot is next to a storm water drain and any construction cannot happen here. There are about 30 fully grown trees planted here. On 25 Aug, 10 trees were cut by these people, and they are trying to cut the remaining 20 trees as well. The miscreants do not have any tree cutting permission, nor any land possession certificate. Besides any construction activity is illegal as this is next to a storm water drain.

Please help save the trees and unauthorised encroachment of land. 87 10.0 33, Pipeline Rd, Bovipalya, Nagapura, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560086, India Near Chaitanya Techno School (earlier Nandini Theatre) 13.00331741 77.5421643 Nagapura 473.0 Trees and Saplings Prevent Unauthorized Tree Cutting BBMP Resolved 2

text:
5-1-2019 08:29 191 BESCOM Power Cut Issues since past 3 years Respected Sir/Madam,

We have been observing BESCOM power cut of different category, and it has been going on for last 3 years, would have raised complaints in 100's (docket number of A category and N category), have met BESCOM officials, but nothing has helped. 

The nature of BESCOM power cut are like this:
1. Frequent BESCOM power cut (2 min, 5 min, 1 hrs, few hrs)
2. BESCOM power cut only in Purva Skywood, when BESCOM power exists in all the street lights and vicinity. 
3. 36 hrs BESCOM power cut (more than a day)
4. we have two phases in Purva Skywood, BESCOM power cut will happen in only one of the phases. 

During my last converstation (9 months back), i was told the area is being developed and will become model sub-division, BESCOM power will be provided with UG cable, we did see UG cable being laid out from HSR Layout to Silver County Road, but we continue to have BESCOM power issues.

As i write this complaint, we have another Frequent BESCOM power cut happening.

Please help.

Thanks
Anjanish 33 1.0 92, Silver County Rd, Lakedew Residency- Phase 2, Harlur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068, India Purva Skywood 12.89407431 77.66064577 Singasandra 4.0 Electricity and Power Supply Regular Supply Of Electricity BESCOM Open 2

text:
5-1-2019 08:29 191 BESCOM Power Cut Issues since past 3 years Respected Sir/Madam,

We have been observing BESCOM power cut of different category, and it has been going on for last 3 years, would have raised complaints in 100's (docket number of A category and N category), have met BESCOM officials, but nothing has helped. 

The nature of BESCOM power cut are like this:
1. Frequent BESCOM power cut (2 min, 5 min, 1 hrs, few hrs)
2. BESCOM power cut only in Purva Skywood, when BESCOM power exists in all the street lights and vicinity. 
3. 36 hrs BESCOM power cut (more than a day)
4. we have two phases in Purva Skywood, BESCOM power cut will happen in only one of the phases. 

During my last converstation (9 months back), i was told the area is being developed and will become model sub-division, BESCOM power will be provided with UG cable, we did see UG cable being laid out from HSR Layout to Silver County Road, but we continue to have BESCOM power issues.

As i write this complaint, we have another Frequent BESCOM power cut happening.

Please help.

Thanks
Anjanish 33 1.0 92, Silver County Rd, Lakedew Residency- Phase 2, Harlur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068, India Purva Skywood 12.89407431 77.66064577 Singasandra 4.0 Electricity and Power Supply Regular Supply Of Electricity BESCOM Open 2

10/20/2019 11:34 185 Borewell dug in lake bed and getting used for commercial purpose Respected Sir/Madam,
A borewell is dug in anniyappa lake bed and getting used for commercial purpose, this might dry up the lake as the minimum of 50000+ lts of water is pumped out daily, when i filed a compliant 10919185 it was rejected mentioning this is private borewell, so who has given permission for digging borewell in lakebed and use for commercial purpose? 
Please look into this matter before the lake dries out.

text:
11-9-2021 09:29 192 Have recently constructed a house at Shirdi Sai Layout, Adjacent... Have recently constructed a house at Shirdi Sai Layout, Adjacent to Hiranandani township off Bannerghatta road. . Further to the construction we applied for a Kaveri water supply connection and have got a RR# allocated to us (RR# VS203626).

Since the connection was activated more than 5 months ago we have not received any water supply to this house, though bills have been getting generated regularly. I have also paid these bills upto date. To try and resolve the issue of getting water supply I have raised 2 complaints also on the system for this under complaint numbers BWSSB-2020-11-03-208890  and  BWSSB-2020-10-21-204396, which were closed without any reason being given. I have raised a third complaint as well with the number  BWSSB-2021-02-01-246133.  However I have not received any response to these nor any resolution to the same. 182 2.0 Akshayanagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India 12.8677991 77.6166843 Begur 23.0 Water Supply and Services Regular Water Supply BWSSB Open 0

text: 1-11-2022 23:24 25 Road blocked for repair of storm water drains, pending since many days The road from Hennur main road to Janakiram layout has been blocked since many days for repair of the storm water drain. Later on, the road to the other side of Janakiram layout (4th cross onwards) has also been dug and left like that. There is stagnation of sewage water near 1st cross and leakage of the sewage water near 4th cross. It has become very inconvenient to travel through these roads now specially when we have to take 2-wheeler and have children and/or elderly people with us. Because of this problem, the overall connectivity from Janakiram layout to Hennur main road is also very difficult. We are having a tough time getting groceries, post delivered, etc. Please resolve this issue at the earliest. 73 10.0 2Jvr+Fjj, Ashwath Nagar, Hbr Layout, Amani Byrathikhane, Karnataka 560077, India Near cauvery Ford service centre, Hennur main road 13.04365067 77.64154956 Horamavu 18.0 Storm Water Drains Maintenance And Repair Of Storm Water Drains BBMP Open 0

5/23/2019 12:08 199 Sporadic Electric Supply. This concern has been raise innumerable times, but BESCOM has not found a solution.  In the past few days electric supply is almost no there.  There is not enough supply even to charge the UPS batteries.  The food in the fridge is spoilt, children are not able to study.  BESCOM's tag line - "lighting up your life"  is totally an irony.

In this modern age, in the Silicon Valley of India, BESCOM is not able to provide a most basic amenity of keeping the electric supply steady. 

BESCOM needs to investigate into the recruitment criterias as the department is infested with total incompetent individuals. 

I write this complaint for 4th or 5th time with total disappointment and disgust. 33 1.0 Kyalasanahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560077, India Next to Hema Institute 13.0667494 77.6634107 Other 4.0 Electricity and Power Supply Regular Supply Of Electricity BESCOM Open 0

8/20/2020 16:33 3 Water problem There has been lot of water problem in akashvani layout 1st and 2nd cross. As everytime borewell motor will gone and i don't know how many time they get repair of that borewell motor. Nowadays it's become common. Kindly put new motor or  arrange to supply water for each and every house in akashvani layout. Because we are getting filled  our sumps by borrowing watertanks and need to pay thats too much.If you cannot get it repair borewell motor or replace new motor please arrange BWSSB water connection to every house and put meter and charge no problem. Because now whatever water we are getting it's free.  Now for cauvery water connection also they have given but 
 no water connection as i think still trials is going on. 
Kindly ask the local incharge to visit the area and collect the opinions from every house regarding this water problems. 182 2.0 14, 2Nd Cross Road, Akashavani Layout, Swagath Layout, Ams Layout, Vidyaranyapura, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560097, India Akashvani layout vidyaranyapura 13.08657437 77.56105526 Atturu 23.0 Water Supply and Services Regular Water Supply BWSSB Open 0

1/22/2020 22:15 191 BWSSB MAIN SANITARY PIPE LAID 1 YEAR AGO AND INDIVIDUAL CONNECTION NOT GIVEN TO HOUSES About 1 year ago , Roads in and around Parappana Agrahara were dug causing huge inconvenience to the public in the form of damaged under ground BESCOM wires, damaged Water pipes ,damaged sanitary pits . They laid Main Sanitary Pipe and till date the Sanitary connection is not given to Individual Houses. Without Completing the Sanitary Connection , Asphalting Road activity is taken in hurried and urgent manner. Firstly Kindly complete the Activity of Giving Sanitary connection to Individual Houses. Then Please complete the activity of providing the Cauvery water  metered BWSSB  connection to Individual Houses 

After completing the above mentioned BWSSB Main sanitary and Metered water connection activities to  individual houses, please take up  the Road Asphalting Activity so that activities are done in planned manner for good urban infrastructure for our Beloved Mega city BENGALURU 72 2.0 Parappana Agrahara, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068, India 14th Main Parappana Agrahara 12.8734883 77.6580911 Singasandra 472.0 Sewerage Systems Maintenance And Repair Of Sewage Lines BWSSB Open 0

text:
7/23/2020 13:17 140 Creating nuisance in the area The people residing in the 2nd cross, 2nd Main are suffering daily with the fruit vendors which were designated for plantain leaf selling. These vendors were before plantain leaf vendors  Due to the lack of supply of plantain leaf, the vendors started to sell the fruits in wholesale. Customers who are coming to purchase these fruits are not maintaining the social distance, spitting and smoking everywhere making nuisance. Even after requesting with the vendors to take necessary actions, they were not listening to the local people. They are creating havoc. 
People living in that are suffering. Veterans and Children are living in fear due to the Covid-19. We already informed to Police (Circle inspector) also.
Please take necessary actions. 58 10.0 189, 2Nd Main Rd, Kamalanagar, Chamrajpet, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560018, India Between Royan Circle and Canara Bank 12.95978036 77.56845259 Chamrajapet 15.0 Mobility - Roads, Footpaths and Infrastructure Management Of Hawkers and Vendors BBMP Open 0

Heavy metal blows and hacksaw noises right from 7am in the morning till 7pm which generates a lot of pressure in our head due to the heavy decibel which human ears can not tolerate. This is not an industrial area to entertain such work here in between where people live in houses. text: 11/28/2020 10:05 26 Dear Officials, connecting roads in NRI Layout, Kalkere Main Road... Dear Officials, connecting roads in NRI Layout, Kalkere Main Road very bad and not usable (risky to walk when it rains). We have this issue not fixed for past almost 2 years without any progress to fix the roads. We as a common citizen are suffering a lot without any action taken even after complaining several times. text:
11/17/2019 10:11 80 No road from past 1 Year in 5th Cross 5th Main 1st Stage Indiranagar Dear Sir,

It's been almost 1 Year since the road in our street was dug for sewage. We are living with the damaged road since then. We raised a few complaints from the BBMP Sahaaya portal as well but no action has been taken yet. 

We received an officer Mr. Prasanna's (Asst. Executive Engineer [Jeevanbhima Nagar]) contact number (9844416234) in response to our complaints. We called the officer a number of times. From our conversations, it appeared the officer is dilly dallying. We couldn't get any assurance from him as to when the maintenance work of the road will begin.

Kindly look into this matter.

Thanks and Regards
Residents,
5th Cross 5th Main,
1st Stage Indiranagar

text:
5/29/2020 19:56 43 Tree fallen on House Building Hi Team,

After the huge downpour in Bangalore this week, a huge tree has fallen over our house building and on the road. This has blocked the entire road as well. Common public is not able to pass by, we are unable to close our house gate and is also causing frequent power fluctuations. The tree has brought down the cable wires along with that. This has disrupted our Interment connection facilites which we use everyday for our work. My work is in jeopardy cuz of your ignorance even after we complaining several times and reach out to all the civil bodies - BBMP, BESCOM, MLA - Keshav Murthy as well, yet there's no response.

This is not the first time we have complained the local BBMP officers. They give out the answer each time - "We will send someone ASAP". I've not seen anyone till date.

With a heavy heart, I'm writing this to you to make some arrangements soon. 180 10.0 Nandini Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India Near JP Nursing Home, behind SG Public School Road 13.0136616 77.5339379 Nandini Layout 473.0 Trees and Saplings Defacement Of Trees BBMP Open 0

10-3-2019 20:58 150 Its been almost two years after excavating for Cauvery water and... Its been almost two years after excavating for Cauvery water and gas pipelining the road condition was bad and merely we could see the tar on the road. It was walkable but recently the BWSSB sewage workers excavated it more and roads turned into complete muddy. It is hard to even walk on these roads and bike, cars are getting stuck. Please consider this issue and provide us with some good roads.

At Koudenahalli Anganwadi teacher not registering my baby name for ration.We went nearly 10 times for anganvadi from past one year onwards,She use to tell simple reasond like1)Im very busy now come later2)Im going out now come on next week3)Come tomarrow..Really we fedup with this issue.Govt giving so many facilities for public,this kind of people are misuing  there powers to denighing to regist..Kindly need your help on this.From past 6 months my ration & My kid ration not yet given.. 42 2Nd C Cross Rd, M Vishveshvaraiah Nagar, Ramamurthy Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560016, India Opp to Karnataka pork shop/Anushree metarnity 13.0150032 77.6753334 Ramamurthy Nagar 9.0 Others Others Open 0

3-9-2020 21:00 114 Park has not been maintained Respected Sir / ma'am,

The park opposite to the house # 425,17th main , 2nd a cross, 5th block , koramangala. has not been maintained. There is a  new building that got constructed for "PG" purpose,they  had dumped cement, sand, boulders etc materials on the iron-grill compound wall of park and the entire grill is damaged. text:
6/25/2019 21:21 192 Fixing/Reparing Potholes Dangerous road made by excavation contractor for sewerage.

After deep excavation for sewerage pip line, contractor has not filled the trench properly. Because of which many potholes has created, many vehicles has trapped regularly, due to which School buses and cabs are not coming to Chowdeshwari layout main road and Vishnuvardhan statue road. After June 23rd Sunday rain, these roads are filled with mud in the height of 2 inches to 6 inches. There roads are become so dangerous that people afraid to walk or drive the 2 wheeler or 4 wheeler. So please take the necessary action and do the new tar road as soon as possible. For the time being please fill the holes and remove the muds from the road. 66 10.0 Vishnuvardhan Statue Rd, Vishwapriya Nagar, Begur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068, India Chowdeswari Layout main road, 7th Cross 12.8841473 77.6268064 Begur 15.0 Mobility - Roads, Footpaths and Infrastructure Fixing/Reparing Potholes BBMP Resolved 4

 I am a college student studies in KSSEM College. The condition of road in front of my College is very bad. There are some small potholes and the road is in irregular shape. text: 8-1-2019 12:31 199 Road is worst in IT hub Neeladri Road in Electronics City Phase 1 is in race for the worst road in any urban area.Electronics City is the official IT hub of Indias IT Capital Bangalore. We all will have a general perception that this place will be super developed as it houses to the premium IT companies like Infosys, Wipro, HP etc. It is true to a certain extent. The roads are clean and developed inside electronics city but as soon as the road leaves the company area and enters to the residential area, the scene completely changes. nYes I am talking here about Neeladri Main Road, Electronics City Phase 1. This is road is not far from the Indian IT boom story, yet thoroughly neglected. This area is having a real estate boom with lots of premium apartments, restaurants, super markets, villas etc. but the road is a torture to the nearby residents and to whoever uses it to travel in and out of Electronics City. 378 bus route more pollution route and next to Mumbai City. At a first look you wont believe this road exists in Bangalore that too in back yard of Indias premium IT hub.nRecently ELCITA developed the road till Wipro but afterwards the road condition is pathetic. The road is full of potholes, potholes and bigger potholes.nProblem faced by people in this arean Jam packed traffic in the evening and morning even with lesser vehicles compared to other area of Bangalore.n You cannot drive straight due to the pot holes resulting the opposite flow of traffic.n Each evening you can see standstill traffic with dead blocks.n As the vehicles travelling slowly due to the bigger potholes, the vehicles coming from behind are trying to overtake and causing the opposite flow to stop. n Each vehicle is trying to overtake as there is no median or road divider marks. n This road is a hell for pedestrians. No place to walk on the road as there is no foot path.n Road is full of dust and it is very difficult to go even in two/four wheelers forget about pedestrians.n Dangerous for children to catch their school busses. nI am no urban expert and not sure who is responsible for the development of the road. I am not sure if it is responsibility of Central Govt, State Govt, BDA, BBMP, ELCITA, Area MP or Area MLA. But I am sure to repair this 1 KM stretch of road it will not take crores of money or years of planning. It is a small stretch of road and a proper road will benefit not only the residents of this area but also for those who travel thru this road to Electronics City.nPossible Solutionn Pothole free proper road will solve 80% of the problems.n Proper marking on the road as median is not possiblen Foot path for pedestrians with drainsn No Parking sign boards at proper places and crossings.nnThis Neeladri road being a newer area in Bangalore map, we expect this to be properly planned and good for living. If we cannot fix the problems of a new area then how age old problems of Bangalore can be solved. PLEASE HELP 66 10.0 Neeladri Rd, Karuna Nagar, Electronics City Phase 1, Electronic City, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560100, India Max showroom to SHELL Petrol Bunk 12.8412591 77.6489561 Other 15.0 Mobility - Roads, Footpaths and Infrastructure Fixing/Reparing Potholes BBMP Resolved 1

The road is full of potholes, potholes and bigger potholes.nProblem faced by people in this arean Jam packed traffic in the evening and morning even with lesser vehicles compared to other area of Bangalore.n You cannot drive straight due to the pot holes resulting the opposite flow of traffic.n Each evening you can see standstill traffic with dead blocks.n As the vehicles travelling slowly due to the bigger potholes, the vehicles coming from behind are trying to overtake and causing the opposite flow to stop. n Each vehicle is trying to overtake as there is no median or road divider marks. n This road is a hell for pedestrians. No place to walk on the road as there is no foot path.n Road is full of dust and it is very difficult to go even in two/four wheelers forget about pedestrians.n Dangerous for children to catch their school busses. nI am no urban expert and not sure who is responsible for the development of the road. I am not sure if it is responsibility of Central Govt, State Govt, BDA, BBMP, ELCITA, Area MP or Area MLA. But I am sure to repair this 1 KM stretch of road it will not take crores of money or years of planning. It is a small stretch of road and a proper road will benefit not only the residents of this area but also for those who travel thru this road to Electronics City.nPossible Solutionn Pothole free proper road will solve 80% of the problems.n Proper marking on the road as median is not possiblen Foot path for pedestrians with drainsn No Parking sign boards at proper places and crossings.nnThis Neeladri road being a newer area in Bangalore map, we expect this to be properly planned and good for living. If we cannot fix the problems of a new area then how age old problems of Bangalore can be solved.
